doc.description: Filters the list of allowed Block Names
doc.long_description: This hook defines which block names should have block name and attribute data- attributes appended on render.
doc.long_description_html: This hook defines which block names should have block name and attribute data- attributes appended on render.

doc.long_description: This hook defines which block namespaces should have block name and attribute `data-` attributes appended on render.
doc.long_description_html: This hook defines which block namespaces should have block name and attribute data- attributes appended on render.

doc.description: Filters if an item being added to the cart passed validation checks.
doc.long_description: Allow 3rd parties to validate if an item can be added to the cart. This is a legacy hook from Woo core. This filter will be deprecated because it encourages usage of wc_add_notice. For the API we need to capture notices and convert to exceptions instead.

tags.name: param
tags.content: True if the item passed validation.

tags.name: param
tags.content: Variation ID being added to the cart.

doc.long_description_html: Allow 3rd parties to validate if an item can be added to the cart. This is a legacy hook from Woo core. This filter will be deprecated because it encourages usage of wc_add_notice. For the API we need to capture notices and convert to exceptions instead.

doc.description: Filters if taxes should be removed from locations outside the store base location.
doc.long_description: The woocommerce_adjust_non_base_location_prices filter can stop base taxes being taken off when dealing with out of base locations. e.g. If a product costs 10 including tax, all users will pay 10 regardless of location and taxes.

tags.name: internal
tags.content: Matches filter name in WooCommerce core.

doc.long_description_html: The woocommerce_adjust_non_base_location_prices filter can stop base taxes being taken off when dealing with out of base locations. e.g. If a product costs 10 including tax, all users will pay 10 regardless of location and taxes.

doc.description: Filter coupons to remove when applying an individual use coupon.

tags.name: internal
tags.content: Matches filter name in WooCommerce core.

tags.name: param
tags.content: Array of coupons to remove from the cart.

tags.name: param
tags.content: Coupon object applied to the cart.

tags.name: param
tags.content: Array of applied coupons already applied to the cart.

doc.description: Filters if a coupon can be applied alongside other individual use coupons.

tags.name: internal
tags.content: Matches filter name in WooCommerce core.

tags.name: param
tags.content: Coupon object applied to the cart.

tags.name: param
tags.content: Individual use coupon already applied to the cart.

tags.name: param
tags.content: Array of applied coupons already applied to the cart.

doc.description: When extensions implement their equivalent blocks of the template hook functions, they can use this filter to register their old hooked data here, so in the blockified template, the old hooked functions can be removed in favor of the new blocks while keeping the old hooked functions working in classic templates.
doc.long_description: Accepts an array of hooked data. The array should be in the following format: [   [     hook => <hook-name>,     function => <function-name>,     priority => <priority>,  ],  ... ] Where: - hook-name is the name of the hook that have the functions hooked to. - function-name is the hooked function name. - priority is the priority of the hooked function.

tags.name: param
tags.content: Additional hooked data. Default to empty

doc.long_description_html:
Accepts an array of hooked data. The array should be in the following format: [ [ hook => , function => , priority => , ], ... ] Where:

  • hook-name is the name of the hook that have the functions hooked to.
  • function-name is the hooked function name.
  • priority is the priority of the hooked function.

tags.content: True to enable cache, false to disable cache.

doc.long_description_html: This is a hook taken from the legacy cart/mini-cart templates that allows the permalink to be changed for a product. This is specific to the cart endpoint.

Filters customer data before a customer account is registered.
doc.long_description: This hook filters customer data. It allows user data to be changed, for example, username, password, email, first name, last name, and role.
doc.long_description_html: This hook filters customer data. It allows user data to be changed, for example, username, password, email, first name, last name, and role.

doc.description: Filters whether or not the product has enough stock.
Filters whether or not the product is in stock for this pay for order.

doc.long_description: This hook filters registration errors. This can be used to manipulate the array of errors before they are displayed.

tags.name: internal
tags.content: Matches filter name in WooCommerce core.

doc.long_description_html: This hook filters registration errors. This can be used to manipulate the array of errors before they are displayed.

doc.description: Filters the array of shared settings.
doc.long_description:
Low level hook for registration of new data late in the cycle. This is deprecated. Instead, use the data api:
 ```php Automattic\WooCommerce\Blocks\Package::container()->get( Automattic\WooCommerce\Blocks\Assets\AssetDataRegistry::class )->add( $key, $value ) ```
doc.long_description_html:
Low level hook for registration of new data late in the cycle. This is deprecated. Instead, use the data api:

Automattic\WooCommerce\Blocks\Package::container()->get( Automattic\WooCommerce\Blocks\Assets\AssetDataRegistry::class )->add( $key, $value )

doc.description: Filter the HTML markup for a single product image thumbnail in the gallery.

tags.name: param
tags.content: The HTML markup for the thumbnail.

tags.name: param
tags.content: The attachment ID of the thumbnail.

doc.description: Filters cart item data sent via the API before it is passed to the cart controller.
doc.long_description:
This hook filters cart items. It allows the request data to be changed, for example, quantity, or supplemental cart item data, before it is passed into CartController::add_to_cart and stored to session.
 CartController::add_to_cart only expects the keys id, quantity, variation, and cart_item_data, so other values may be ignored. CartController::add_to_cart (and core) do already have a filter hook called woocommerce_add_cart_item, but this does not have access to the original Store API request like this hook does.
doc.long_description_html:
This hook filters cart items. It allows the request data to be changed, for example, quantity, or supplemental cart item data, before it is passed into CartController::add_to_cart and stored to session.

CartController::add_to_cart only expects the keys id, quantity, variation, and cart_item_data, so other values may be ignored. CartController::add_to_cart (and core) do already have a filter hook called woocommerce_add_cart_item, but this does not have access to the original Store API request like this hook does.

doc.description: Filters the Store API nonce check.
doc.long_description: This can be used to disable the nonce check when testing API endpoints via a REST API client.

tags.name: param
tags.content: If true, nonce checks will be disabled.

doc.long_description_html: This can be used to disable the nonce check when testing API endpoints via a REST API client.

doc.description: Filters the quantity limit for a product being added to the cart via the Store API.
doc.long_description: Filters the variation option name for custom option slugs.

tags.name: param
tags.content: Quantity limit which defaults to 9999 unless sold individually.

doc.long_description_html: Filters the variation option name for custom option slugs.

doc.description: Filters the quantity minimum for a cart item in Store API. This allows extensions to control the minimum qty of items already within the cart.
doc.long_description: The suffix of the hook will vary depending on the value being filtered. For example, minimum, maximum, multiple_of, editable.

tags.name: param
tags.content: The cart item if the product exists in the cart, or null.

doc.long_description_html: The suffix of the hook will vary depending on the value being filtered. For example, minimum, maximum, multiple_of, editable.

doc.description: Filters options for Rate Limits.
